actionOk

private void actionOk()
Calls either actionOkAdd or actionOkModify according to the button that has been clicked in mother dialog, then sets dialog unvisible.

checkText1

private boolean checkText1()
Checks textfield with the number of corner nodes for the selected element type.

Returns:
True if given nodes are correct, False vise versa.

checkText2

private boolean checkText2()
Checks whether given parameters for radii of curvatures are correct or not.

Returns:
True if entered parameters are correct, Flase vice versa.

checkElement

private boolean checkElement()
Creates demanded element and checks for negative-zero jacobian and existance.

Returns:
True if element has been succesfully created, False vice versa.

checkNodes

private boolean checkNodes()
Checks if given corner nodes exist or not and, checks whether given nodes form a plane (for quad elements).

Returns:
True if nodes exist, False vice versa.

createElement

private void createElement()
Creates demanded element.

checkCoordinates

private Node checkCoordinates(DVec pos)
Checks whether given coordinates are occupied by a node of the structure or not.

Parameters:
pos - The coordinates to be checked.
Returns:
True if no nodes are at the given coordinates, False vice versa.

createInternalNodes

private void createInternalNodes()
Creates internal nodes of element.

checkJacobian

private boolean checkJacobian()
Checks the determinant of jacobian of element.

Returns:
True if the determinant of jacobian is not zero or negative, False vice versa.

checkIdenticalElements

private boolean checkIdenticalElements()
Checks structure for the existance of identical elements. Identical elements are the elements having the same nodes and type.

Returns:
True if no identical elements found, False vice versa.
